0x01 Inter-block time

ã€€ã€€This is the time elapsed between the generation of each block. For bitcoin the blocks are generated every 10 minutes, for litecoin itâ€™s 2.5 minutes. Any value can be used but an appropriate value is usually between a few minutes; if the generation time is too fast it might destabilize the blockchain, if itâ€™s too slow it may not attract many users[4].

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
